item.title: Monitor vSAN with ControlUp
item.description: One of the new enhancements of ControlUp 7.3 is vSAN monitoring support. item.title: Tested SMS PASSCODE multi-factor authentication with VMware Horizon View
item.description: Citrix Web Interface Protection RADIUS Protection Cloud Application Protection IIS Web Site Protection ISA/TMG Web Site Protection Windows Logon Protection Secure Device Provisioning (for ActiveSync devices) In this review we test how-to integrate SMS PASSCODE with the latest version of VMware Horizon View using RADIUS authentication. What is SMS PASSCODE Unlike traditional hardware-token based solutions, SMS PASSCODE works without distribution of any hardware-tokens. As a result, the logistic overhead involved is minimal and roll-out is much faster.

item.title: Monitor VMware Horizon View environments with ControlUp
item.description: A couple of weeks ago ControlUp released version 4.0 with support for VMware Horizon View. In this blog post I share my experience with ControlUp 4.0 monitoring VMware vSphere and VMware Horizon View. What is ControlUp ControlUp is a real-time performance monitor for Microsoft Remote Desktop Services (RDS), Citrix, and physical- and virtual server environments.
